values: [ Email: Hong Kong Angels / Language: Cantonese ] I realize this is short notice, but. Is anyone not available Friday?
[ Filter: Private ] I don't want this.

[ Filter: Private ] I'm not sorry. And it's leveled to the ground as well. I didn't plan for it, but it is at it should be. As he tried to make it be. It seemed right at the time, and I don't regret it in retrospect, even if it wasn't something I thought through. If you're reading this, Seals. Tong. Pratt. Well. Good for you.
[ Email: Hong Kong Angels; Language: Cantonese ] August 1st. Let's shoot for early in the morning.

[ Filter: Private ] Can't stop trying just because. [ Email: Hong Kong Angels; Language: Cantonese ] Hello. Skye and Cori have informed me they want to take down a barrier, and well. If you feel like I have prohibited you from taking initiative, please don't. The faster all the barriers fall, the faster the city does, and the end of the year is nearing, as well. Other cities have taken it upon themselves to take down more than one barrier at once, and, well, in the unlikely circumstance that the Hung Shing Temple should not fall, hitting them again soon after wouldn't be expected from us, at least not yet. The Hong Kong Observatory has been standing long enough, I think. Please let me know if you intend on joining or not, and I'll enclose a date later on.
[ Filter: Private ] Is this supposed to be what's normal? Mother wouldn't approve, which I guess makes it worthwhile in itself.
[ Filter: Private ] Even without the barrier falling, yesterday was okay. There's not much left of it now, in any case. [ Filter: Public ] Congratulations.

[ Email to: Cori, Skye, Mercedes, Lily, Stella and Angeline; Language: Cantonese ] It's been a while since anything was taken down in this city. And, well. Kowloon Walled City Park has been standing long enough. There are more than enough parts of the park to go around, and I still have some explosives left from the prison. We won't do this until after you return to Hong Kong, Angeline, since it was your suggestion. Which makes me shoot for the coming Monday. Please reply whether or not you intend to be there.

[ Filter: Mercedes and Lily; Language: Cantonese ] Hello. You are the two remaining Angels I have failed to have much contact with in the past couple of months. I was simply wondering if you are interested in our cause at all. For future planning. [ Filter: Cori, Skye, Stella and Angeline; Language: Cantonese ] I was wondering about your pro-activity concerning the end of the world.

[ Filter: Private ] I'll be alright. Even without Alex, Skye, Cori, Stella and Angeline are helpful. They're all new, but considering who I used to have. Well. I almost feel like I should thank whoever took care of Lucky. Lily and Mercedes don't respond to filters, however. Perhaps I should pay each of them a visit. We'll see. [ Filter: Noah; Language: Cantonese ] Are you free?

[ Filter: Hong Kong Angels; Language: Cantonese ] We've lost Alex, Jenna and Lucky in the course of too few days. I'd rather not have to befriend any new Angels before the city falls, so if any of you are considering pulling anything drastic, please let me know first. I'm healing surprisingly fast, undoubtly partially thanks to Stella. [ Filter: Public; Language: English ] I'm surprised nobody has made progress reports yet.
... [ Filter: Hong Kong Angels ] Alex is dead. [ Filter: Angeline and Stella ] Who did it.
[ Filter: Private ] He's a puzzle. Loyal, though. [ Filter: Hong Kong Angels ] Let's have a headcount.
[ Filter: Private ] Let's hope your replacement is a less waste of space. [ Filter: Alex ] You didn't tell me what Angeline was trying to do.

[ Filter: Private ] At first, I wanted to make a well-informed, contemplated decision. Regardless of how I felt, it should have been weighed and thought about considerably more than I ever did. Perhaps I didn't try hard enough, or perhaps I wanted it to be based on emotion. If that was the case though, why did I insist on fooling myself into thinking it wasn't? That's four for Seal and three for Angel. But we have counterparts, because fate likes to even things out. Why was there even a need for me to choose, then? My role isn't more powerful than his, the only difference is he had no choice in the matter. I chose for him. I chose for everyone in this city. If I was one of seven who could change the future, then why does he exist? Fourteen instead of seven makes a world of difference, but if I was meant to make this choice all along, does that mean the final battle is set as well? I couldn't have been a Seal, not in my lifetime. But if that's the case, fate is just playing with all of us. I'll play my part. At least I can get to choose that much.
[ Filter: Private ] I don't even care. It wasn't a barrier, and even if it were, it'd just bring it down faster. His bed is unmade. Mother said they were coming tomorrow.
[ Filter: Alex; Language: Cantonese ] Everything is ready for Friday, right?

[ Filter: Private ] Bastard. As if he has any right to come back here and try to lecture me. As if I actually trust them all. They've made it clear enough they want nothing to do with me. He would've chosen Seal, he says. Chosen Seal, him? I would've liked to have seen it. It would've made him an Angel.

[ Filter: Private ] Only one replied. Does that mean the rest of them do have a problem with me and are too scared to reply. Or do they simply not care. I guess it doesn't matter. I can do this with only Alex. And Angeline, she wanted to help. Although I do not know about this Lai person. I haven't seen her around much. Then again, I haven't been paying attention to anything. I can't talk to him anymore.

[ Filter: Private ] This was not like last time. [ Filter: Hong Kong Angels; Language: Cantonese ] If anyone else have a problem with me, I would rather know sooner rather than later so I can thrown you off a building now and be done with it.
[ Filter: Private ] Feels like an anti-climax, almost. [ Filter: Alex; Language: Cantonese ] Hi. Do you have a moment?

[ Filter: Hong Kong Angels; Language: Cantonese ] If you decided to blow up something in the near future, I'd rather you told me before going ahead with it. [ Filter: Public; Language: English ] I suppose that makes Hong Kong unfortunate.
[ Filter: Private ] They're impatient, aren't they.
[ Filter: Private ] I want to do something.
[Filter Private] I feel like I can't wash it off. [Filter: Public] Nobody tell me "I told you so."
[Filter: Private] Am I supposed to ask if anyone died. Am I supposed to care?

[Filter: Private] Introduction. Expositions. First subject group, transition, second subject group, codetta. Development. Recapitulation. If it does not end on the tonic key, use of coda. Unresolved recapitulation. Coda. Rinse and repeat. The Hermitage. My request doesn't pertain anymore, does it, now that I'm not important. I'm surprised Alex hasn't already set up his bombs somewhere. But what if they're right? What then. I've already exposed myself.

[Filter: Private] Everyone keeps offering to help, I'm flattered, really, but they need to stop it. Maybe I should just go back. He has done nothing either, why did he even want to take it in the first place? What use is it to him when he's doing nothing and I That was my reason for What good does thinking like this do. At least they're finally gone.
[Filter: Private] go away go away go away go away go away.
[Filter: Private] As if he has any clue.
[Filter: Everyone but Brenton; Language; Cantonese] Out.

[Filter: Private] Boring? He thinks my life would be boring without those things? My life would be better off, if I could have my destiny back, you little shit, you couldn't have taken that part of my life? Maybe I could be different, and not wait to see what everyone else wants, what everyone else thinks, and you- You think that, you think you're justifying this? That you've done me some grand gesture, that I'm happy without it? As if you could make a better choice than me, as if you could do a better job at it. As if Unbecoming of me. And what is that you're doing, then, raping me of the one thing that That I just
Not theft? Not theft, really, how is that not theft. It's certainly not borrowing, because you didn't ask and I never would've said yes. Give it back, or I'll make that promise into reality. Now.

[Filter: Private] Maybe they're getting impatient. Maybe I'm getting impatient. Maybe I should choose. I'm not sure I know how. That one in St. Petersburg... he's a liar. I am too, I suppose, but not by choice. It's the only real choice I'll ever have. But does it really matter? I feel like doing something other than this. [Filter: Public] I'm almost getting used to the quiet.
[Filter: Private] . . . [Filter: Public] Please excuse my brother.
[Filter: Private] At least Christian didn't decide to track me down today. Questions I don't want to answer.

[Filter: Private] ... that is not They can't all go up before I choose, I [Filter: Hong Kong Angels / Language: Cantonese] Your efforts are duly noted, and while I understand the want to keep leveling buildings to the ground, I am going to ask you politely to wait until I have made my choice. If you don't, you won't like the result.

[Filter: Private] What you do? You don't rely on others so much. You do it yourself. You act independently, even if you are no such thing. You choose according to you, and don't ask for others to tell you how to figure out your own destiny. That's what you do. The Seals want to meet me now. She was very official and curteous. Perhaps better than Alex, or Jenna, or that other girl. Still. Most of them told me already. What is she trying to accomplish?
[Filter: Private] Couldn't hurt. [Filter: Public] I was curious, mainly because there are some familiar faces around here, if anybody else attend South Island School on Nam Fung?

[Filter: Private] That Jenna person who replied is also an Angel, it appears. That's five for them and three for the Seals. I'm not sure what to think of their reasoning. Alex... he's detached. Jenna seemed more apathetic, and Lucky... well. She's judging the entire human race for something her parents did. I would not claim parents do not have the most influence over their children, but it does raise a question. Do I have the right to decide the world is to end based on my personal experiences? Fate seems to think so. There are six others as well, yet only five of them seem to be acknowledging it. If that is the case, though, Mother and Father might have been acting through their selfish desires, but in the process, they didn't hurt the human race as a whole. Some people might even say humanity benefited from their actions, however self-serving they were. I didn't expect Christian to be here. It might complicate things.

I suppose it's a lot to take in for those who didn't know. Even those who did know, the magnitude of it... Well. I was only told of one city, and now there are seven. The symbolism isn't lost, of course, and tarot readings aren't known to be reliable, but it explained a fair deal, either way. [Language: Cantonese] Who else are in Hong Kong here, and which of you are "aligned"?

[ Filter: Private ] So someone decides to make it a close to public thing and everyone is expected to flaunt their personal business over online journals. Idiots. Of course Christian isn't going to mind.

Hiiiiiiiiiiii~ ♥♥♥♥♥♥ I'm Kathy & I'm from Hong Kong & I'm a happy girl~ how are all of you doing~? ♥♥♥♥ I'm 17 and I'm living with the best best best older brother in the world, Christian!♥ I love him~! I love the world~! ♥♥ OK! Bye! ♥
